review: It only works in the room where the wifi box is directly located/  Even when I plug it into televisions in neighboring rooms, and my wi-fi signal strength says strong, the Fire TV stick will not load.
author: nicole

review: Unfortunately I can't review the stick itself as it doesn't work where we wanted to use it.  Make sure if you are getting this you have a internet connection that can handle it.  Bought for a birthday present for my son's room, but it just constantly loses signal so you can't use it.  It looks like it would have been great if we could get it to work.
author: Dawn Rose "Dawn"

review: So far the Amazon Fire TV stick is living up to their name......It's great!!!!
author: Kelly

review: Dissappointed , does no work outside the US!!!  Correction,  only Netflix world because  I  have an account.... I can't access the Premium features of Amazon or any other provider. ..
author: Patricia Gomez Esquivel

review: The Fire stick is above my expectations.  So much better content than Netflix.  I am bragging about it to everyone I meet.
author: Brenda Ludwig

review: I love it! Very easy to use and totally worth it
author: Tiffany damon

review: It came with minimal directions on the set up process. The product itself is was good.
author: Melanie Land

review: Very easy to navigate and auto set up if you have a prime membership! Only had for a short time but love it so far! I downloaded the free App, and use voice search.
author: Dudabuda
